get.summary: Get a service contract for a service by id.
get.description: This endpoint retrieves a service contract for the supplied service.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Comma separated list of relationship names you want to include the data of.
The relationships that can be included are:
  • carrier_contract
  • service_groups
  • service_insurances
  • service_option_prices
  • service_option_prices.service_option
